item.title: Work experience
item.description: As I have the overall working experience in the about section, I will only specify the main categories and tools used in those categories Skills/Tools Marketer Social Media Adobe Suite (Image/Video editing, UI/UX flows, and more) Email Marketing Branding Strategy Cybersecurity Professional Reporting Specialist Kibana PowerBI Software Developer Elastic Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash) Python Ruby Documentation Scrum Master
